alert.note: Alert for Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 2:59PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Gulf and southwestern Liberty Counties through 345 PM EDT/245 PM CDT/... At 258 PM EDT/158 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wewahitchka, or 21 miles north of Port St. Joe, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stonemill Creek, Wewahitchka, Honeyville, Kern, Wilma, Vilas, Chipola Cutoff, Nixon Garden, Twin Pole, Central City and Owens Bridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
